Oooh! Vatch your hands, monsieur!
ON EGGS, as he slowly exits the closet. He awkwardly adju his collar as he takes in his surroundings. Couples are joined together in a WALTZ, filling the entrance hall wit activity.

Eggs looks up at Portley-Rind at the top of the stairs, t at the impenetrable wall of dancers. He tries to walk thr the crowd and is nearly trampled. There is no way to get Portley-Rind without causing a scene.
Winnie runs up, now in a new, clean YELLOW DRESS.
There you are.
We have to get to your father!
You can't just cut through.
Winnie sizes up the situation: Portley-Rind across the ro the dance floor between them. Suddenly her face brightens
We'll dance!
We'll WHAT?
Winnie grabs Eggs by the shoulders and pulls him onto the
-- Dance floor, joining the swirling lines of waltzing couples.
Like this. One two three... one two three.
Winnie continues counting the steps as she guides Eggs to center of the dance.
Just make a box.
You made me get out of my box!
With your feet, silly!
Eggs looks down, concentrating very hard.    He gradually catches on.
That's it, Eggs. You're dancing!
She laughs. Eggs lets down his guard and joins in laughin
For a moment they forget why they are at the party. They crazily around the room, looking back and forth at each other, until Eggs looks past Winnie and sees Snatcher/Fro Frou glaring at him.
Snatcher is here.
Who? Where?
Winnie sees Madame Frou Frou waltzing with Sir Langsdale. Frou Frou breaks from Langsdale as partners change, lungi toward Eggs. Broderick catches her hand and pulls her bac into the waltz.
My turn, Madame.
(confused, gasps) Frou Frou?
- Eggs and Winnie try waltzing across the floor toward Portley-Rind, but before they can reach the stairs, the d forces them apart. New partners whirl them in opposite directions.
Winnie!
- Eggs ends dancing with Female Aristocrat B, the lady he licked.
I uh...
- Madame Frou Frou heads for Eggs again as partners swap Sir Langsdale, her biggest fan, leaves Lady Cynthia and g her.
Ah ha ha ha!
- Frou Frou/Snatcher grabs Sir Broderick by the face and shoves him away. She grabs Lady Cynthia, pulling her clos with a hand wrapped around her face, dancing directly tow Eggs.
(startled, confused) Ooh!
Uh oh! (yells to Eggs) EGGS LOOK OUT!
- Eggs turns in time to see Frou Frou/Snatcher racing tow him. He ducks under ladies' gowns, crawling across the da floor. As he passes under each lady, their dresses shoot
(SCREAMS!)

- Frou Frou/Snatcher whips up ladies' dresses looking for Eggs, until she/he get slapped across the face while peek under a skirt. Frou Frou/Snatcher sees Eggs crawl out fro under a dress, toward the stairs and Lord Portley-Rind.
- Portley-Rind stands sniffing and caressing his giant cheese, oblivious to the chase happening right below him.
- Eggs races up the stairs on all fours, his feral side coming through. Frou Frou/Snatcher GRABS his leg.
Ahhh!
Portley-Rind turns in time to see Eggs go totally feral--
What is going on here?
-- and BITE Madame Frou Frou's hand!
OWWW!
Snatcher shoves Eggs and send him flying right into the g cheese wheel. The wheel rocks off its pedestal, and rolls down the stairs!
NO NO NO NO NOOOO!
Lord Portley-Rind chases after the cheese, trying to stop Everyone stops dancing and watches as the cheese wheel ro through the foyer. The butler opens the door and it rolls the front door...
... Down the Guild steps... through the Market Square... the streets... lower and lower, until it's out of view. W hear a SPLASH as it reaches the river.
Portley-Rind stands frozen in shock at the foot of the stairs.
What have you done!?
Eggs begins to speak... haltingly at first... but then growing in confidence.
Lord Winnie's Father...
The crowd and Portley-Rind all turn and stare at Eggs.
People of the upper world -- Archibald Snatcher has lied to you all!
Frou Frou/Snatcher looks at the crowd and GULPS!
He told you that boxtrolls are monsters -- that they steal children -- but they don't. They would never hurt anyone. I know because...
Eggs looks to Winnie.   She nods, encouraging him.
Because... I am the Trubshaw Baby!
A long beat. CLOSE ON LORD PORTLEY-RIND as he seems to be thinking intensely...
Do you know how expensive that cheese was?
What?!
We might as well have built a children's hospital!
Did you hear a word he said?!
(dismissive, to Winnie) Not now.
(points to White Hats) Have you any idea how long it will take my men to fish it out of the river?!
The White Hats look worried. Boulanger rolls forward in h wheelchair and adjusts his hearing horn.
Ahh. What?
Eww... the river?
Eggs moves down the stairs.
If you won't listen to me, ask Snatcher himself.
Eggs PULLS OFF SNATCHER'S WIG. A long beat, as Snatcher l caught.
GASP!/ Oh my!
(whimpers) You have me. I am not a true red head.
(sympathy for Frou Frou) Poor woman.
(sympathy for Frou Frou) For shame.
Now the crowd turns ANGRY.
How rude! / The lad's fuddled! / An outrage! / The very thought!
I saw him bite a bug on a cracker!/ He must hate cheese! / He's a mad man! / I believe her's wearing a lamp shade as a sleeve!
Nasty boy! / Oh, he's awful!
That's the one who crawled under my dress! / I knew he was up to no good the second he goosed me. / My husband is angry so I am too!
Portley-Rind angrily climbs the stairs to Eggs.
You insult our guest of honor?
He grabs the wig away from Eggs.
Who are you?!
A proper boy.
He is with me father.
You know this... creature?
He's my friend. What he said is
Enough!
But...
Winifred!
Winnie gives in and bows her head. Eggs is stunned and hu Portley-Rind turns on him.
I don't want to see you again, do you hear me?
But he's not a...
Leave my house. Now!
Eggs walks slowly down the stairs. As he passes, Frou Frou/Snatcher smiles an evil grin.
Eggs glares at Snatcher and walks past Winnie without eve looking at her. She looks heartbroken.
The crowd shuffles away from Eggs as he walks out the doo The butler wordlessly shuts it behind him.
The music begins again and the crowd goes back to chattin Portley-Rind hands the wig back to Madame Frou Frou and l her down the stairs.
Zees parties are so confusing. No?
There, there. You poor, poor dear.
Winnie watches Lord Portley-Rind pass.
CLOSE ON a manhole cover. Eggs is opening the cover in th center of the square. They meet at the very spot they fir saw each other.
Eggs, wait!
You said fathers were supposed to help. That they took care of kids.
(sigh) Well, they're supposed to.
People are just mean and selfish. They're monsters.
Eggs climbs down into the manhole.
Not all of us. You aren't.
Eggs stops climbing.
Well, I don't want to be a boy anymore.
Eggs starts down again. Without looking up at her, he ext a hand.
It was a pleasure meeting you.
Eggs...
And, Winnie, I really do mean it.
Winnie sadly watches Eggs climbs down into the dark.
Fish is waiting with the remaining boxtrolls as Eggs spit out of the chute, back into the cavern.
Eggs!
They gather around and DRUM THEIR BOXES, excited. Eggs lo at the crowd, frowning.
We have to leave the cavern.
The boxtrolls stop drumming.
We're not safe down here anymore. Come on...
Eggs pushes through the boxtrolls heading for the pneumat tubes.
Eggs?
Fish follows him, pulling the EGGS box out of his front f and holding it out. The other boxtrolls don't move.
Eggs turns back toward them.
I said, we have to leave now!
The boxtrolls shake their heads and GURGLE nervously.   S shrink away from him as he shouts.
Snatcher is planning something! We have to get out of here.
Knickers simpers, rubbing his hands together and pulling box up higher.
Come on let's go. Now!
The boxtrolls hide in their boxes like scared little kids pulling sheets over their heads during a thunder storm.
Get up! No! NO! (shaking Knickers out of
Don't don't just hide! (tries to shake Ink loose) What are you doing?!
Eggs looks around for Fish.
Fish, help me.
Fish quickly unfolds Eggs' box and offers it to him, smil Eggs SMACKS the box out of Fish's hands!
NO! I'm not a boxtroll!
Fish shrinks away and hides in his box as Eggs comes clos shaking and whimpering.
I'm sorry. I... I didn't mean it. Please come out. Fish.
Suddenly, the whole cavern rumbles... dust and pebbles dr from the ceiling and bounce on Fish's box. Eggs stares at ceiling.
He's here.
The boxtrolls look up, confused. The cavern RUMBLES and SHAKES. LIGHTS GO OUT one by one... the giant chandelier

head_text.subj: FLICKERS, GOES OUT AND DROPS TO THE CAVERN FLOOR. SMASH

text: A hole opens in the cavern roof. Spinning blades of a dig machine pierce the ceiling. Large chunks of rock crash do as the enormous MECHA BOX DRILL drops into the cavern!

Boulders and dust rain down. Through the murk, Eggs sees huge metal box covered in bits of scrap metal, with gaps revealing an interior of huge gears and cables all spinni and twisting like the guts of a giant watch. The whole machine has an ad hoc, made-from-assorted-scrap-and-junk that is unique to a boxtroll creation.
ON EGGS as his eyes go wide.
Two big spot lights BLAST ON like eyes, and the mecha box drill rises up on three legs. As it rises, it tears walkw and lights from the cavern walls.
AHHHHHHHH!!!!!
As it turns, it rips the intricate boxtroll clock from it stalagmite and sends it crashing down. The mecha box look like a monstrous, giant mechanical boxtroll.
The mecha box's spotlight "eyes" cut through the dust and darkness, catching each fleeing boxtroll, making them instinctively STOP RUNNING and HIDE in their boxes!
Snatcher's head appears out of the top. He still has his Madame Frou Frou white pancake makeup on, with a slash of crimson lipstick, making him look crazier than ever.
How's that for an entrance!
Trout, Pickles and Gristle emerge from beneath the machin
Dramatical!
Don't you mean "dramatic"?
Mr. Gristle laughs insanely.

Snatcher hits a lever and a large MECHANICAL ARM unfolds the drill. Snatcher laughs heartily as he plays with his toy, opening and closing the CLAW at the arm's end. He swings the claw at stalactites, sending them crashing to ground.
AHH!
Eggs shoves boxtrolls out of the way as the rocks fall to cavern floor.
Some jump out of the way and Snatcher swings again, sendi the clawed arm into Eggs' nook, smashing the music machin
Eggs drags boxtrolls towards the pneumatic tubes -- but t stay in their boxes refusing to move.
Get up! That thing will kill you!
My, my, what a surprise. Don't look like your little friends wanna run, does it?
How strange, how peculiar. No, wait, it's exactly as I expected!
Eggs stacks a group of boxtrolls under the tubes, all of still tucked into their boxes, and pleads.
You have to get up. Please!
NEVER GONNA HAPPEN, TRUBSHAW!
Eggs turns the anchor switch and the boxes start to rise the tubes. The mecha box's claw arm GRABS the tube and ri it out of the machine. Cocoa falls! There's no way out.
Eggs jumps out of the way as the mecha claw arm drops the tube overhead. He rights himself and gasps up at Snatcher at the mecha drill controls.
Time to earn my white hat!
Snatcher pulls another LEVER and releases the VACUUM ARM. slithers toward a group of boxtrolls. Eggs whimpers as Snatcher hits the lever's BUTTON to begin the suction.
The boxtrolls in front of Eggs get sucked up by the mecha box's vacuum arm. He tries to hold on a boxtroll mid-suct but it is ripped away.
No!
The mecha box's vacuum arm turns on other boxtrolls.
Sweets and Knickers grab hold of boulders. Knickers nearl loses his/her bottom box as he/she is hoovered up. Sweets teeth are sucked out of his mouth, then he is sucked up.
A panicked Eggs looks around, eyes wide.
Fish! Shoe!

Eggs grabs Fish and Shoe by their arms, where they try to hold themselves together. He tries to run with them in to Gristle clubs Shoe toward the vacuum arm with his cricket bat, where he is sucked up.
Eggs and Fish huddle together as Snatcher rides up, headlights blaring. Eggs has to shield his eyes from the blinding light.
Eggs picks Fish up, wrapping his arms around the box as b he can.
NO! Please!
Give up, Trubshaw! Boxtrolls lost looooong time ago. These miserable pests will never be a match for a man with dream!
MR. GRISTLE!

Eggs holds Fish tightly and tries to run but Gristle fire his bolas gun after him. It wraps around them and they fa to the ground. Eggs lands hard and hits his head, knockin him unconscious. Fish peeks out of his box, fretting.
Eggs? Eggs?
Snatcher flips levers and switches, grinding gears and sending flames out of the drill's FURNACE GRILL as the machine stands. He points to Eggs.
ACQUIRE THEM!
As Snatcher stomps away, the Redhats step in and pull Fis out of the bolas rope. Fish's head comes out of his box a screams.
He HISSES AND BARES HIS TEETH at the Redhats! Pickles and Trout jump back! Gristle knocks Fish unconscious with the butt of his rifle. Trout and Pickles recoil.
Never seen one do that before!
THAT BOXTROLL WAS MAD!
Gristle walks back toward the mecha box, laughing. Pickle look shocked at Fish's flaccid body. Trout picks up the l Eggs and slings him over his shoulder.
Goodness always triumphs over evil... right Mr. Trout? (Trout walks away) Mr. Trout?
Pickles picks up Fish and follows Trout.
I'm still sixty to seventy percent certain that's us. A couple of good guys vanquishing evil and all that.
ON EGGS in the mecha drill's CAGE. He lies passed out ato pile of boxtrolls. As the mecha box climbs back up the ho it pushes a huge stalagmite over and the rest of the cave collapses down around it.
INSIDE THE MECHA BOX CAGE, EGGS' SEMI CONSCIOUS POV: he l at the home he once knew, now destroyed. His eyes close.
Eggs wakes to find himself back in his box and in a hangi cage. A figure swings back and forth in the foreground, whispering.
Jelly. Jelly!
What the...?
Eggs starts and looks up through cage bars - a strange ma hangs upside down by a pair of iron boots.
His bright, crazy eyes peek out from a tangled mass of scraggly beard and long hair. This PRISONER stares intent at Eggs.
When I'm good I get jelly. I like jelly. JELLY!
Who are you?
Who am I? Who are you?
(confused, defeated) I don't know.
Eggs turns away. LONG BEAT
Boy? Or Boxtroll?
Eggs doesn't answer.
Dresses like a boxtroll, but, uh... looks like a boy.
A boy-troll? Yes, or a box-boy?
A new species. Never seen before.
Eggs looks toward the sound of footsteps.
(humming... then in normal
Ohhh... nooo boxtrolls!
Eggs watches as Snatcher comes down a dark stairway and w up toward the Prisoner.
Trubshaw senior loved his kid, same as regular faaaaathers did....
Snatcher smacks the Prisoner and tugs on his beard. Eggs' eyes dart back and forth between Snatcher and his long lo father, HERBERT TRUBSHAW.
(to the Prisoner) He's my, you're my... are you my father?
JELLY!
Herbert chuckles in an unhinged kind of way. Eggs' face falls.
He was once. Won't get much out of him now, though. A decade hanging upside down scrambled his noodles good.
Snatcher spins Prisoner Herbert around.
(RE: mecha box) Still, did a fine job designing this beauty. Best inventor in town, your dad. Working with the best little builders.
Snatcher spins Eggs' cage so he can see the Redhats stack the boxtrolls into a pile, underneath a menacing-looking crusher.
Fish and Shoe poke their eyes out above their boxes, then immediately dart back inside, scared.
No, no no, don't hide. Fish! Shoe! RUN! Get up, get up and run! Sparky. Sweets, run!
Yell all you want, boy. They ain't gonna run. You can't change nature.
Eggs pants and lowers his head, defeated. More and more boxtrolls are placed on top of each other. The whole pile SHIVERS in fear.
I'm coming down, men! I want to pull the crushing lever myself! (wistful, to Eggs) It's the little moments.
Snatcher heads down. Herbert chuckles again. Eggs slowly looks at him.
Yes. I see it now! A mutation of nature. Self-imposed metamorphosis.
Boxboy! You did it!
I don't understand.
You changed your nature. Tell them.
Herbert gestures toward the shivering box pile. He still crazy eyes, but for a moment, he stares right at Eggs. Ma he's lucid after all. Eggs can't tell.
I tried. They won't listen.
Eggs turns away from Herbert and bows his head. Snatcher flips a lever, starting the machine. Eggs starts, holding to the bars as he stares intently.
You did it. You made you. Tell them. Tell them. Tell them!
Eggs watches as the gears continue to turn and the crushe rise. The pile of boxtrolls shiver with fear.
Boxboy! BOXBOY!
My son.
Eggs looks up and turns to Herbert.
Father?
Despite being upside down and covered with hair, Herbert looks almost sane.
Son! They can change. They can do it! Tell them.
BEAT. Eggs looks from Herbert's face to the still shiveri boxtrolls.
Fish, Fish, everyone! Listen! I'm a boxtroll and I stopped hiding, so you can too! Stand up for yourselves! We can fight back! Don't be afraid anymore. Sparky! Fragile! Get up! Get up and fight!
The box pile stops shivering and settles. Are they listen Eggs swings his cage around and he pleads.
Just stand up and take a step. Please! Do it for me!
A beat. Then...
Well, good speech.
Snatcher pulls a lever, and--
SMASH! The box crusher flattens the entire pile of boxtro
No! No! No! NOOOOOO!
Fish, Shoe, Sparky...
Herbert is smiling and mumbling the same thing over and o
Look what you did. Look what you did! (laughs)
Yeah. Yeah look what I did. They're crushed.
Snatcher appears, coming up the stairs. Eggs looks up at Snatcher in horror.
Hey, Boss, your monsters are all loaded.
(staring right at Eggs) All but one.
Eggs looks up, terrified.
The wide view of rooftops and chimneys in golden morning light is marred by the SMOKE of a coal furnace. The Mecha Drill makes its way slowly up the hillside town.
Snatcher's amplified voice booms out of a scratchy loudspeaker and through the sleepy morning streets, rousi the townsfolk. Lights appear in windows.
Hear ye! Hear ye! Good citizens of Cheesebridge, come out of your homes! The curfew has been lifted!
QUICK SHOTS OF TOWNSPEOPLE, the reverse of the opening sc of the movie:
- A man OPENS his peep-hole and looks around.
- Another OPENS his door and looks up as a shadow passes his house.

- A MOTHER swings her door open and a LITTLE BOY rushes outside to see: Snatcher riding atop the giant mecha dril it lumbers up the winding streets towards Market Square. Trout and Pickles follow behind, with Mr. Gristle riding back of the Mecha Drill.
Whoah! What is it?
It's Snatcher!
Fear not, the monsters have been vanquished! Your streets are SAFE!
(VERY MENACING) SAAAFE!
Trout and Pickles walk along behind the machine, amongst gathering crowd, worried.
The townspeople smile in relief and wonder, and step out their doors.
The curfew is over?
Yeah...
That's incredible.
They begin to follow after the mecha drill.
Join me! Your purger of pests! Your white knight who has taken back the night!
As Snatcher continues his ascension, all kinds of townspeople, women, children, rush to join the parade. Th Mecha Drill's heavy iron legs smash into the cobblestones it walks up the hill.
The crowd arrives at the stairs of the guild with the mec box. Snatcher beams with pride as he calls out through th whiney loudspeaker.
Lord Portley-Riiiiind!
The door cracks open and Lord Portley-Rind looks out.
I come bearing the most delightful news.
He blinks in amazement at the scene before him - Snatcher atop a giant machine, a huge expectant crowd around him.
Mr. Snatcher, what the devil is this?
Show him lads.
The Redhats release the crushed boxes from the cage so th fan out dramatically at the foot of the stairs.
Flattened to extinction. Every last, slimy one of them.
The crowd applauds.
Up at her balcony, Winnie hears the noise and comes out t investigate.
Your lordship, I said I would not rest until I caught every last boxtroll and I am a man of my word.

He hits a switch and the mechanical arm swings around to present Eggs, wearing the evil-boxtroll costume Mr. Grist wore in the Madame Frou Frou show. The mask covers Eggs' and his hands are bound behind his box. His feet and hand are covered with grotesque claws.
With this boxtroll, I will end their reign of terror.
Up on her balcony, Winnie stares at the monster. CLOSE ON EGGS LOGO on its box.
EGGS!
(to crowd, arms wide) I'd say that deserves a white hat, don't you?
The crowd cheers.
A white hat for Mr. Snatcher!
Our hero! / Be-hatify the man!
Lord Portley-Rind steps nervously forward.
Yes, well. I'm not sure... We'd have to take a vote...
The crowd begins chanting loudly.
(in unison, chanting) WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT!
The Redhats stand with the crowd, Gristle chanting along them. Pickles and Trout look uncomfortable.
There's probably some, uh, paperwork... then have a hat shipped in...
Snatcher moves the machine forward, dangling the "boxtrol out front, daring Portley-Rind to deny the mob.
No. Methinks a deed of this magnitude deserves something a bit more... significant.
Portley-Rind stares up at him blankly.
I want YOUR hat.
My hat?
Snatcher looks appealingly back at the crowd, who are goo and riled up.
(in unison, chanting) WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT!
WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT!
WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT!
The crowd moves forward, pressing closer to the Cheese Gu stairs. They continue calling for Lord Portley-Rind's hat
CHANTING! CHANTING! CHANTING!
WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT!
Lord Portley-Rind gestures to the crowd to calm down.
(through gritted teeth) All right. All right. As soon as that boxtroll is dead, you may have... my... hat.
Lord Portley-Rind casts down his eyes, beaten.
Snatcher hits a button and the mecha box is lowered to th ground.
Yes. And then we can eat cheese together.
In the Tasting Room.
Snatcher laughs and climbs down from the mecha drill. Gri has removed his hat and taken a knee, Snatcher uses his h as a step stool.
Haha, FOOT!
He hands a REMOTE CONTROL to Trout, who is huddled nervou with Pickles. Gristle stands and returns his hat to his h grinning.
Do the honors.
Snatcher strides off towards Portley-Rind.
(whispers to Trout) I thought this was all gonna be a show, like with Frou Frou. (pulls out fake mustache) I brought my mustache and everything.
This really does stretch the limits of the term "hero", doesn't it?
Gristle glares at them. He GROWLS, threateningly.
HAT! (CLEARS THROAT LOUDLY)
Pickles quickly puts on his mustache and Trout presses th button to raise the mecha box. Eggs in his monster disgui swings on the chain.
Snatcher steps in front of Portley-Rind.   He removes his hat.
Musician, drum-roll!
ON the One Man Band, who excitedly strikes up a drum roll
Snatcher tosses his red hat away.
Mr. Trout! Lower the beast down.
Trout reluctantly maneuvers Eggs over the furnace's mouth Eggs struggles to free himself. He presses a button and t furnace doors OPEN WIDE and white-hot flames pour out of coal fire.
CLOSE ON EGGS as his eyes widen, flames reflected in them He struggles.
Snatcher takes a knee, and presents his head. Portley-Rin reluctantly removes his hat, breathing hard.
Repeat after me: With this hat, I, state your name...
With this hat, I, Archibald Penelope Snatcher...
Trout begins to lower Eggs into the furnace. He and Pickl are sweating, intensely reluctant to kill the boy. Portle Rind slowly begins to lower the white hat onto Snatcher's head.
With profound esteem for dairy and dairy products... proudly swear to uphold the dignity of the White Hat.
The hat creeps lower as Portley-Rind matches the last boxtroll's progress toward the flames.
(repeating after Portley-
Proudly swear to uphold the dignity of the White Hat.
Suddenly, Winnie bursts out the front doors and sees Eggs moving closer and closer to death.
Father! Father!
Not now, Winifred!
Exasperated, Winnie runs to Pickles and Trout.
STOP! STOP!
And henceforth, whereupon and thereupon... the placing of this hat... we shall conclude by... ushering our newest member into a world of privilege, pride, and pasteurized dairy!
I can't, miss. Apologies.
We're just doing our jobs.
Your JOBS? Are you pest exterminators or evil henchmen?!
(long, hurt gasp) I knew that's how people saw us.
ON EGGS, mumbling against his mouth gag.
You don't have to do this!
She has a point, Mr. Pickles. This could be our chance for redemption.
A second chapter!
People love a flawed hero!
The FEET of Eggs' BOXTROLL COSTUME are licked by flames a creeps closer to the furnace.
Sure, yes, whatever! Just let him go!
Pickles and Trout stare at each other, unsure of what to
ON SNATCHER and the white hat hovering so tantalizingly c to his head.
ON EGGS as he shuts his lids tightly against the coal fir
ON the One Man Band, who is looking a little tired and sw from a really long drum-roll.
Back to Trout and Pickles, who smile at each other.
Yeah? (at Mr. Pickles' nod) Yeah.
Trout stops the machine and the mechanical arm reverses i direction, moving Eggs away from the fire.
(behind the gag) Huh?
Snatcher growls as Lord Portley-Rind swiftly pulls his wh hat away.
ON the One Man Band as he finally stops his drum-roll, an collapses exhausted.
Trout and Pickles turn to Winnie.
Redeemed!
Thank you, miss.
Gristle LUNGES IN, seizes the controller.
Ha HA!
STOP IT!
Winnie tries to take the controller from Gristle, but he snaps his teeth at her menacingly.
Gristle turns the mecha drill arm back on! Eggs resumes h descent.
Mr. Trout pulls Winnie out of the way.
Watch yourself.
The tips of Eggs' boxtroll-suited feet are licked by the flames, and he pulls them up out of the way.
Gristle laughs heartily at Eggs' precarious situation.
Ha Ha HAAAAA!
In the quiet hush of the ceremony, suddenly a faint sound be heard GROWING LOUDER.
Jelly! JELLY! Jelly!
Gristle turns to the sound.
Hmm?
Through the mouth of the boxtroll costume, Eggs sees--
-- Snatcher's vehicle comes shooting into the square! covered in boxtrolls.
I like Jelly!

Fish is stacked on Shoe in the driver's seat. Fish steers Shoe works the pedals. Herbert sits in Snatcher's seat, laughing in delight, his hair and beard whipping in the w He giggles into the megaphone while the boxtrolls holler cheer.
JELLY! Ha ha ha ha!
Eggs excitedly murmurs through his gag.
Winnie smiles.
FISH!
The truck SKIDS to a stop, spilling NAKED BOXTROLLS
BOXTROLLS! / And they're NAKED! / AAAAAH! / NAKED TROLLS! / EWW! No wonder they wear boxes!
ON Gristle as he's overrun by naked, angry boxtrolls!
OHH! EWW -- NAKED!
What is going on here?!
I... I am befuddled as your lordship! I... I crushed them myself!
Portley-Rind places the white hat back on his own head.
Evidently not! That was the closest you will ever come to a White Hat. (THEN, twirling his
I hope you enjoyed it.
